alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Northern High Plains; Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 26 at 7:52PM MDT until October 28 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM THURSDAY TO 9 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph, with gusts up to 75 mph are expected. Isolated wind gusts approaching 85 mph in wind prone areas along the immediate eastern slopes of the Rocky Mountain Front. * WHERE...The Rocky Mountain Front and adjacent foothills and plains. * WHEN...From 3 AM Thursday to 9 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles or those pulling trailers.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: East Glacier Park Region; Northern High Plains; Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
